TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː s t ɛ l ə æ s k ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð ð ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v ð ɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b æ b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ p ɪ k t aɪ f l ɑː k f ɚ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː l ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ b æ ɡ s æ ŋ w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n

SNAKE INCONTEXT: sneɪk
SNAKE NOCONTEXT: sneɪk
SNACK INCONTEXT: snæk
SNACK NOCONTEXT: snæ
BAGS INCONTEXT: bæɡ-
BAGS NOCONTEXT: bɛɡ
